# This cell is generated from runtime parameters. Learn more: https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=2161015
pipe_id = "7357c4c6-e36c-4848-b4cd-b5f16e24dbf0"
cod_calendario_monetario = 166

import com.microsoft.spark.sqlanalytics
from com.microsoft.spark.sqlanalytics.Constants import Constants
from pyspark.sql.functions import col


env = mssparkutils.env.getWorkspaceName()
if(env == 'syn-tlf-jarvis-prod'):
    sqlWorkspaceName = "syndpjarvisprod"
elif(env == 'syn-tlf-jarvis-test'):
    sqlWorkspaceName = 'syndpjarvistest'
else:
    sqlWorkspaceName = 'syndpjarvisdev'


# // Cosmos Variables
linkedService = 'CosmosDb'
containerTarget = 'fotografia_projecao'

# // SQL Dedicated Variables


# // SQL Tables Variables
view = "vw_carga_projecao"


# // Read Tables SQL Dedicated Pool
vw_foto_projecao = spark.read.synapsesql(f'{sqlWorkspaceName}.rl3.{view}' ).where(f'cod_calendario_monetario = {cod_calendario_monetario} and pipeline_id = "{pipe_id}"' )


columnRenamed = vw_foto_projecao.withColumnRenamed("carta_fian√ßa", "carta_fianca")
columnRenamed.createOrReplaceTempView("view")
#### Cast timestamp and date to string to avoid epoch in cosmos
df_final = df_query.selectExpr([f'CAST({coluna} as string)' if tipo in ('timestamp', 'date') else coluna for coluna, tipo in df_query.dtypes])

# Write to Cosmos Container
(df_final
    .write
    .format("cosmos.oltp")
    .option("spark.synapse.linkedService", linkedService)
    .option("spark.cosmos.container", containerTarget)
    .option("spark.cosmos.write.strategy", "ItemOverwrite")
    .option("spark.cosmos.write.bulk.enabled", "true")
    .mode("append")
    .save()
